about_the_game:
Angel Roulette: Immersive Turn-Based Battle Desktop Game
Supports live confrontations among three players

Overview of the Demo Version:
Angel Roulette is a turn-based battle desktop game that integrates strategy, customization, and competition, allowing players to freely choose a variety of weapons and combine special functional items in a meticulously designed game world to engage in intelligent and courageous battles.
Customization in the Demo Version:In the game, players can not only experience thrilling battles but also fully showcase their personal style. With resources and experience accumulated through battles, players can unlock and customize their characters' clothing and physique. The demo version allows you to explore some of these outfits and accessories, enabling every player to create their unique game image.
Competitive Challenges and Achievement Displays in the Demo Version:Victory in battles in the demo version not only signifies glory but also brings abundant resources and experience points, helping players level up. In the full version, these glorious battle records will be recorded in the global rankings, where players can compete with others worldwide to demonstrate their exceptional strength.

In-depth Analysis of Gameplay in the Demo Version:
Weapon Choices in the Demo Version: Revolver (6 rounds of ammunition, balanced damage), Pump-Action Shotgun (5 rounds of ammunition, high damage). Other weapons will be unlocked in the full version.
Special Items: The game is filled with various special items such as First Aid Kits, Magic Potions, Future Envelopes, Oracle Rings, Grenades, etc. They can turn the tide of battle at crucial moments and add infinite possibilities to your path to victory.
In the world of Angel Roulette, every choice is crucial, and every battle is full of variables.

Get ready to face challenges, show your wisdom and courage, and prove your strength to the world! Good luck, and may the road to championship begin with you!

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, the player can use guns to shoot enemies, can use cold weapons to attack enemies, can use explosives and set traps.  The same computer-controlled enemy will do the same thing to the player.  There are monsters in the game that attack and bite the player.  Players can practice yoga movements and fitness movements in the yoga gym, players can practice dance movements in the dance studio, players can change clothes in the changing room and customize the figure of the character.
